title: Account
description: Mastodon API Account schema based on GoToSocial implementation

username.description: The username of the account, not including domain

acct.description: The account URI as discovered via webfinger

discoverable.description: Account has opted into discovery features

group.description: Account identifies as a Group actor

created_at.description: When the account was created (ISO 8601 Datetime)

url.description: Web location of the account's profile page

avatar.description: Web location of the account's avatar

avatar_static.description: Web location of a static version of the account's avatar

header.description: Web location of the account's header image

header_static.description: Web location of a static version of the account's header

followers_count.description: Number of accounts following this account

following_count.description: Number of accounts followed by this account

statuses_count.description: Number of statuses posted by this account

last_status_at.description: When the account's most recent status was posted (ISO 8601 Date)

emojis.description: Array of custom emojis used in this account's note or display name

fields.description: Additional metadata attached to this account's profile

suspended.description: Account has been suspended by our instance
